Text.val: 12.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
07.07.2004 JJ SCR6596 added end of year check on v.Date
03.06.2004 JJ SCR6220 cont. Changed date parameter handling to DD.MM.YYYY

STP.TXT: Program not started because this is not end of year

SQL_STMT_U.val: select distinct LCCH_ADMNO, LCCH_CLNTNO, LCCH_LDGR_NO from :1/LCCH, :1/ADMN, :1/LDGR where ADMN_NO = LCCH_ADMNO and LDGR_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE and LDGR_NO = LCCH_LDGR_NO and LDGR_LEDGERTYPE = 4 or LDGR_LEDGERTYPE = 5 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select cast(sum(lgcd_amountdebith - lgcd_amountcredith) as decimal(13,2)), lgcd_admno, lgcd_ldgr_no from :1/lgcd, :1/ldgr where lgcd_admno = ldgr_admno and lgcd_ldgr_no = ldgr_no and substr(lgcd_date, 1, 4) = ':2' and (ldgr_ledgertype = 4 or ldgr_ledgertype = 5) group by lgcd_admno, lgcd_ldgr_no for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
